body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Car Solutions. My name is Vincent Thompson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jennifer. Could you provide me with your phone number and address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My phone number is five five five, eight seven six, two three four five, and my address is three zero zero, Elm Street, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Jennifer. Can you also let me know your email address and date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My email is jennifercarter@example.com and my date of birth is December twenty third, nineteen ninety five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that. Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Jennifer?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate you taking the time to chat with me. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. Have a wonderful day, Jennifer.
